content: 5 - ch1 half_double_crochet in the same space as ch1 and in the next 2 stitches 2hdc in next stitch repeat half_double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 2hdc all around slip_stitch to first stitch to join 50 round 6 - ch1 half_double_crochet in same space as ch1 and all around slip_stitch to first stitch to join 50 rounds 7 - 15 - repeat round 6 for a total of 10 rounds of half_double_crochet s *you can make adjustments at this point to either add or remove an half_double_crochet round for a more personalized fit* last round - ch1 single_crochet all around slip_stitch to first stitch to join finish off and weave in ends enjoy your charisma fitted beanie hashtag your finished beanie #charismafittedbeanie on instagram i d love to see your finished work please credit my shop in stitches - crochet by sl @inslstitches for the pattern with your finished projects please do not alter rewrite or attempt to resell this pattern as it is copyrighted thank you for your cooperation charisma fitted beanies - pattern by in stitches-crochet by sl ©2017
